EmailTemplate.subject: Register: Tech Seminar on Next Generation Public Safety
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Public Safety Technology Seminar:
Next Generation - Are You Ready?
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Public Safety Professional}},
We hope that you will join us and fellow leaders in Public Safety where will discuss Next Generation 9-1-1 and introduce solutions to improve the workflow of your communications center.
- Common workflow for next generation PSAPs to interact with new types of data such as text, pictures, video and more - Power of CAD to prioritize incoming calls - Right-time intelligence to the call-taker and responder - Systems and network administration services - Mobility solutions for rugged, reliable computing and evidentiary video
Register here: http://offers.tritech.com/TX_NG911Seminar.html <http://offers.tritech.com/TX_NG911Seminar.html>
Hope to see you there!
Questions? Michelle McClellan TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7900 info@tritech.com EVENT DETAILS Don't want to miss this informative technology seminar? See details below and register today. Dates and Locations: Tuesday, December 11 Microsoft Facility - Austin 10900 Stonelake Boulevard Austin, TX
Wednesday, December 12 Microsoft Facility - Las Colinas 7000 N. State Hwy 161 Irving, TX 75039
Time: 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM
Bonus: Door Prizes, Refreshments and Lunch will be provided.
<http://offers.tritech.com/TX_NG911Seminar.html>
